<small>Aramaic form: [[H5202]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַר‎</span>] **verb** ==watch, guard, keep== (Late Hebrew ***id., observe***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***naƒâru***</u></abbr>, ***watch over, protect***; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נצר‎</span> ***protect*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>325</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>83</sup>; Palmyrene in proper name [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>150, 4</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>124</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְמַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (compare [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Job</sup> (2) on [[Job.27.18|Job 27:18]]); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***look at, consider, examine*** (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***overseer*** is Aramaic loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>138</sup>); Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎להנצרהמו‎</span> ***to aid them*** [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>Rev. Sém. iv (1896), 71</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***spectare, intueri***, etc., [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>701</sup>; — compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נטר‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצָרָ֫תַם‎</span> [[Ps.119.129|Ps 119:129]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצָ֑רְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.22|Ps 119:22]]; [[Ps.119.56|Ps 119:56]]; [[Ps.119.100|Ps 119:100]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽצְרוּ‎</span> [[Prov.22.12|Prov 22:12]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצִּר‎</span> [[Prov.3.1|Prov 3:1]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְּרֶ֫נְהוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:58»§ 58</sup>, 4 R.) [[Deut.32.10|Deut 32:10]] feminine suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנְצְרֶ֑כָּה‎</span> [[Prov.2.11|Prov 2:11]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:58»§ 58</sup>, 4 R.); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצֹּר‎</span> [[Ps.119.69|Ps 119:69]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצְּרָה‎</span> [[Ps.119.34|Ps 119:34]]; [[Ps.119.115|Ps 119:115]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצֹּ֑רָה‎</span> [[Ps.119.145|Ps 119:145]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצָּרְךָ‎</span> [[Isa.42.6|Isa 42:6]]; [[Isa.49.8|Isa 49:8]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Bö|Bö]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and others from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצֳּרֶ֑נָּה‎</span> [[Isa.27.3|Isa 27:3]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְּרוּ‎</span> [[Prov.20.28|Prov 20:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנְצֹ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Deut.33.9|Deut 33:9]] (on forms see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:66»§ 66</sup>, 2, R. I) + 15 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֹר‎</span> [[Ps.34.14|Ps 34:14]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְּרָה‎</span> [[Ps.141.3|Ps 141:3]] (dagesh forte dirimens [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:20»§ 20</sup>, 2 b); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְּרֶ֑ה‎</span> [[Prov.4.13|Prov 4:13]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצוֺר‎</span> [[Nah.2.2|Nah 2:2]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֹר‎</span> [[Prov.2.8|Prov 2:8]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצֵר‎</span> [[Prov.28.7|Prov 28:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצֵר‎</span> [[Exod.34.7|Exod 34:7]] + 7 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצְרָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.27.3|Isa 27:3]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצְרִים‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.9|2Kgs 17:9]]; [[2Kgs.18.8|2Kgs 18:8]], etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצוּר‎</span> [[Ezek.6.12|Ezek 6:12]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרִים‎</span> [[Isa.65.4|Isa 65:4]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐν τοις σπηλαίοις</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמְּערוֺת‎</span>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרֵי‎</span> ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצִירֵי‎</span> only here) [[Isa.49.6|Isa 49:6]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרָה‎</span> [[Isa.1.8|Isa 1:8]] ([[BDB#Di|Di]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוֺרָה‎</span> Niph\`al Participle √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּר‎</span>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֻרַת‎</span> [[Prov.7.10|Prov 7:10]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֻרוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.48.6|Isa 48:6]] ([[BDB#Che|Che]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצֻרוֺת‎</span>).


**1.** ***Watch, guard, keep***, a vineyard [[Job.27.18|Job 27:18]] (compare [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Job</sup> (2) on the passage), [[Isa.27.3|Isa 27:3]] (twice in verse), fig-tree [[Prov.27.18|Prov 27:18]], fortification [[Nah.2.2|Nah 2:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצְרִים‎</span> ***watchmen*** [[Jer.31.6|Jer 31:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְדַּל נ‎</span> ***tower of watchmen*** [[2Kgs.17.9|2Kgs 17:9]]; [[2Kgs.18.8|2Kgs 18:8]] in ethical sense of men, guarding the mouth [[Prov.13.3|Prov 13:3]], the way [[Prov.16.17|Prov 16:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span> [[Prov.4.23|Prov 4:23]] the tongue <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרַע‎</span> [[Ps.34.14|Ps 34:14]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, over the door of the lips [[Ps.141.3|Ps 141:3]] of God <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצֵר הָאָדָם‎</span> [[Job.7.20|Job 7:20]] (thou) ***watcher of men*** (iron.).


**2.** ***Guard from dangers, preserve***, with accusative, subject God or his attributes [[Deut.32.10|Deut 32:10]]; [[Ps.25.21|Ps 25:21]]; [[Ps.31.24|Ps 31:24]]; [[Ps.40.12|Ps 40:12]]; [[Ps.61.8|Ps 61:8]]; [[Isa.26.3|Isa 26:3]]; [[Isa.42.6|Isa 42:6]]; [[Isa.49.8|Isa 49:8]]; [[Prov.2.8|Prov 2:8]]; [[Prov.20.28|Prov 20:28]]; [[Prov.22.12|Prov 22:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצֵר נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.24.12|Prov 24:12]] with accusative and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span> ***from*** which [[Ps.12.8|Ps 12:8]]; [[Ps.32.7|Ps 32:7]]; [[Ps.64.2|Ps 64:2]]; [[Ps.140.2|Ps 140:2]]; [[Ps.140.5|Ps 140:5]]. In Wisdom Literature subject is abstract: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבמה‎</span> [[Prov.4.6|Prov 4:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תבונה‎</span> [[Prov.2.11|Prov 2:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צדקה‎</span> [[Prov.13.6|Prov 13:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרֵי ישׂראל‎</span> [[Isa.49.6|Isa 49:6]] ***preserved of Israel***.


**3.** ***Guard with fidelity, keep, observe:*** of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצֵר חֶסֶד לאלפים‎</span> [[Exod.34.7|Exod 34:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); elsewhere of man observing the covenant [[Deut.33.9|Deut 33:9]] (poem) [[Ps.25.10|Ps 25:10]], the divine law [[Ps.78.7|Ps 78:7]]; [[Ps.105.45|Ps 105:45]]; [[Ps.119.2|Ps 119:2]]; [[Ps.119.22|Ps 119:22]]; [[Ps.119.33|Ps 119:33]]; [[Ps.119.34|Ps 119:34]]; [[Ps.119.56|Ps 119:56]]; [[Ps.119.69|Ps 119:69]]; [[Ps.119.100|Ps 119:100]]; [[Ps.119.115|Ps 119:115]]; [[Ps.119.129|Ps 119:129]]; [[Ps.119.145|Ps 119:145]] commands of parents [[Ps.60.20|Ps 60:20]]; [[Ps.28.7|Ps 28:7]] and discipline of Wisdom [[Prov.3.1|Prov 3:1]]; [[Prov.3.21|Prov 3:21]]; [[Prov.4.13|Prov 4:13]]; [[Prov.5.2|Prov 5:2]].


**4.** ***Guard, keep secret***, dubious: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֻרוֺת‎</span> ***secret things*** [[Isa.48.6|Isa 48:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרִים‎</span> ***secret places*** [[Isa.65.4|Isa 65:4]] (see forms above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצֻרַת לֵב‎</span> ***secret, wily minded*** [[Prov.7.10|Prov 7:10]] (of harlot, so [[BDB#RV|RVm]] ***close***, i.e. ***secretive***).


**5.** ***Kept close, blockaded***, dubious: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנָּצוּר‎</span> ***the blockaded*** (so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy; but [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] Bth [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] ***preserved***; [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Bth Toy strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והנשׁאר‎</span>) [[Ezek.6.12|Ezek 6:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר נְצוּרָה‎</span> ***blockaded city*** [[Isa.1.8|Isa 1:8]] (see form above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹצְרִים‎</span> ***blockaders*** [[Jer.4.16|Jer 4:16]] (but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">συστροφαι</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צררים‎</span> i.e. ***foes***). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצוּרִים‎</span> see I <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצר‎</span> **Qal** ***Passive participle***
